posts.message:
I need some feedback guys, if there were to be a new tech community with a difference, what would that difference be in your opinion? 

What would you like to see that you are not seeing in current communities?

posts.caption: venturebeat.com
posts.description: We're reading today that Estonia is implementing a new education program that will have 100 percent of publicly educated students learning to write code.

posts.message:
I have a question, Is it best to mention your freelance work in your cv and consequently in an interview or you are better of without mentioning that ?
For I've met different interviewers and/or managers who reacted differently to that. so what do you think ?

posts.caption: www.ibm.com
posts.description: Scientists from IBM Research have created the world’s smallest magnetic memory bit, reducing the number of atoms needed to store one bit of data from one million to 12, vastly increasing storage data density.

posts.message:
